title.value: Comprehensive assessment of productive qualities of purebred and crossbred sows and their posterity
Комплексная оценка продуктивных качеств чистопородных и помесных свиноматок и их потомства

journal.title: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of Belarus. Agrarian Series

person.name: Balnikov, A.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus)
Ryabtseva, S.V., Municipal Agricultural unitary Enterprise Pedigree State Farm-Combine

abstract.value: Modern technology of swine breeding in industrial scale requires scientific working out of the problems connected with animal feeding, housing and breeding. Quick increase of meat qualities of commercial young animals can be achieved through industrial breeding of genetic potential of foreign meat breeds, such as Duroc and Landrace. The article presents a complex evaluation of reproductive qualities of purebred and hybrid saws along with fattening and slaughter characteristics of their offspring, received during crossing with meat-bred boars. The obtained results on a comprehensive assessment of the reproductive feeding and fatty and meat qualities of the hybrids allow identifying the optimal options of crossing of two and three breeds' combinations YxL, BMxY, YxD, and (BMxY)xD, which are proposed for the introduction at industrial complexes. The conducted research indicates that it's possible to use Duroc and Landrace boars of the German breeding in different options of crossing to get the hybrids with high feeding, slaughter and meat qualities.
